about_the_game:
Step into the thrilling era of the Crusades and forge your destiny in Crusader Knights: Templars. Combining real-time strategy, city-building, and sandbox gameplay, this immersive experience lets you rewrite history and lead a knightly order to glory. Will you rise as a beacon of faith, or succumb to the challenges of a war-torn world?



Choose Your Knightly Legacy

  • Begin your adventure as a founding member of the legendary Templars

  • Travel from Western Europe to the Holy Land to take part in the First Crusades

  • Become a founding father of the Holy Order

City-Building and Resource Management

  • Capture and develop hamlets with dozens of essential structures

  • Navigate complex economy system with survival elements both in RTS and World Map modes

  • Generate resources like silver and piety, which are critical for expanding your influence and sustaining your armies.

Strategic Battles in Real-Time

  • Engage in epic RTS combat against AI armies on land and at sea.

  • Defend your hamlets, siege massive cities, and rewrite history through challenging scripted scenarios.

Dynamic Sandbox Gameplay

  • Transition into open-ended gameplay after the main campaign, capturing new territories and building alliances

  • Experience escalating challenges with Muslim, Slavic, and Christian AI factions vying for control of key regions

Forge Your Order

  • Lead campaigns in the Holy Land, Spain, North Africa, and Eastern Europe. Use strategy and diplomacy to secure alliances or crush your foes.

  • Participate in historical events, like the Reconquista or the defense of Edessa, and determine the fate of the Holy Land.

A Living World of Crusades

  • Explore a massive map filled with towns, cities, and pilgrim routes.

  • Navigate dynamic events, including naval battles, sieges, and AI faction wars.

  • Face challenges such as piety-driven resource systems, excommunication events, and escalating enemy attacks.

Will you rise to the challenge, expand your knightly order, and safeguard the future of Christendom? [i]Crusader Knights: Templars[/i] invites you to embark on a grand journey of strategy, faith, and conquest.

short_description: Travel to the Holy Land with the First Crusades. Rise from a humble knight to the founding father of a world-spanning holy order. Lead through war, faith, diplomacy, and cunning schemes. Experience a unique blend of RTS, city-building, and sandbox gameplay, and shape history!
